subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
Sentences (Criminal)
Decisions and Verdicts
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The decision came despite a recommendation that Rose, an ESPN analyst and former N.B.A. player, not serve jail time and the public support of several prominent figures, including Detroit’s mayor, Dave Bing.
snippet: The decision came despite a recommendation that Rose, an ESPN analyst and former N.B.A. player, not serve jail time and the public support of several prominent figures, including Detroit’s mayor, Dave Bing.
